captions.text:
VOICE
From the studio that nearly

destroyed the X-Men franchise with
"The Last Stand," comes the film

that destroyed your favorite X-
Man...

VOICE (CONT'D)
Wolverine

VOICE (CONT'D)
Journey to 1970's Canada, where
everyone dresses like it's 2009.

VOICE (CONT'D)
And no one has a Canadian accent.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Witness Marvel's most hardcore

character get completely neutered in
his own extremely, boring movie

VOICE (CONT'D)
Watch as Wolverine's centuries of

war are glossed over in one
montage to instead make time for

things no one wants to see
Wolverine do:

VOICE (CONT'D)
Go on dates!

VOICE (CONT'D)
Chop wood!

VOICE (CONT'D)
Get stuck in traffic!

VOICE (CONT'D)
And fumble around in the bathroom!

VOICE (CONT'D)
And if you thought they could only

ruin Wolverine - wait until you see
what they did with Deadpool...

VOICE (CONT'D)
The "merc with the mouth" - gets

his mouth removed, and trades his
cool costume for eight-minute abs

and magic eye shadow - Oh and he
also gets a grab-bag of random

mutant powers that Deadpool never
had.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Are we sure that Brett Ratner
didn't direct this?

VOICE (CONT'D)
Get excited when they introduce fan-
favorite Gambit!

VOICE (CONT'D)
Then get immediately disappointed

when you realize that he's only in
the movie for 5 minutes.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Instead spend time with some of the

lamest mutants you've never heard
of...

VOICE (CONT'D)
Wraith

VOICE (CONT'D)
Agent Zero

VOICE (CONT'D)
Bolt

VOICE (CONT'D)
And Silverfox?

VOICE (CONT'D)
Wow Marvel, really scraping the
bottom of the barrel huh.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Prepare to learn the origin of
boring Wolverine facts like...

VOICE (CONT'D)
Where he got his jacket.

VOICE (CONT'D)
And the super boring story behind
his nickname.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Blah blah blah blah blah.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Ugh. Really?
Strap in for an action movie with
effects so bad...it barely looks
better than the leaked rough cut
everyone pirated online.
Featuring...

VOICE (CONT'D)
This horrible CGI camera trick

VOICE (CONT'D)
This weird CGI ladder.

VOICE (CONT'D)
This awful CGI facelift.

VOICE (CONT'D)
And unforgivably terrible CGI claws

VOICE (CONT'D)
That somehow look worse than the
first three X-men movies.

VOICE (CONT'D)
So get ready to crank up the volume
in one of the shout-iest. Films. Ever.

VOICE (CONT'D)
RAAARAAAARGH this movie sucks.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Starring...

VOICE (CONT'D)
X-Men Origins: Wolverine.

VOICE (CONT'D)
Why can't you movie studios just get along? America needs to see Wolverine fight the Hulk...right?
Hey Screen Junkies don't forget to subscribe.
and make sure to find us at Comic Con, we'll be there.
Check out the link in the description below.

comments.author: Jessica Ecker

comments.text:
I kind of want to address the "Starring" gag references for everybody (And 
for the lulz)

*Huge Jacked Man*: Duh. 
*Corn Chip Nail Tips*: Don't they look EXACTLY like that!?
*Generic Evil Colonel*: Danny Huston just doesn't make the Character stand 
out more prominently from every other fictional General hard-ass. 
*Pochawhocares*: Lynn Collins, and the film looks exactly like that native 
american disney princess.
*Paula Dean*: Fred Dukes is basically a very overweight old lady.
*Worse Than Green lantern*: Dominic Monaghan's acting fell flat.
*Tim Riggins*: Taylor Kitsch is the Kinetic Energy storing mutant, and he's 
also the *Friday Night Lights* guy. Funny stuff.
*William*: Duh. William Adams. Musicians.
*Pa Kent*: The obligatory Father figure who gives Wolverine somebody to 
fight for in this movie when he dies. I like Max Cullen.
*Dead Cyclops Arm Blades*: Okay, f*ck this movie. I hope the ACTUAL 
DEADPOOL MOVIE KICKS THIS MOVIE'S DEADPOOL'S ASS WHEN IT HITS THEATERS! 
Why'd they bastardised him down like this!?﻿

comments.text:
The ending credits. after getting to know deadpool better & yes i get that 
he had some new pooled powers, saved the character. They could of easily 
expanded on that. I read on someones comment(which i thought would of been 
neat) he snaps back too, he gets his voices in his head, and then he could 
of ripped out the katanas implanted in that retract and recreate new 
katana's for himself.Then maybe explain how some of the addtional powers he 
got dissolved due to the fact maybe that his body could maintain all those 
fused powers together. Regardless, the ending credits for deadpool saves 
his character, regardless how you feel what happened into the movie with 
him.﻿
